issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development

fields.description: I set properties  showHorizontalScrollIndicator and showVerticalScrollIndicator in scrollView object to value=false. When i run test the scroll indicators are created automatically depending on content of the scrollView.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Not working properties showHorizontalScrollIndicator and showVerticalScrollIndicator in scrollView
